description: This file defines the NoteAdapter class, which is a RecyclerView adapter used to display a list of notes in an Android application. It manages note item views, binds note data, and handles item click events.

classes.name: NoteAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of notes, uses DiffUtil for efficient updates.

classes.name: NoteViewHolder
classes.description: ViewHolder class for note item views, binds note data to UI components.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates a new ViewHolder by inflating the note item layout.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds a Note object to the ViewHolder.

methods.name: NoteViewHolder
methods.description: Initializes view references and click handling for a note item.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Updates the UI components with data from a Note object.
